verses.verse: Thou shalt not <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H7716>sheep<s%> go <S%H5080>astray<s%>, and <S%H5956>hide<s%> thyself from <S%H7725>them<s%>: thou shalt surely bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto thy <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And if thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be not <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto <S%H3045>thee<s%>, or if thou know him <S%H622>not<s%>, then thou shalt bring it home <S%H8432>to<s%> thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and it shall be with thee until thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H7725>it<s%>, and thou shalt restore it to him.

And <S%H3651>so<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and so shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H8071>garment<s%>; and so shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> with every lost <S%H9>thing<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother<s%>'s, which he hath <S%H6>lost<s%>, and thou hast <S%H4672>found<s%>: thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not hide <S%H5956>thyself<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H2543>ass<s%> or his <S%H7794>ox<s%> fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H5956>hide<s%> thyself from <S%H6965>them<s%>: thou shalt surely help him to lift them up <S%H6965>again<s%>.

A <S%H802>woman<s%> shall not wear that which <S%H3627>pertaineth<s%> unto a <S%H1397>man<s%>, neither shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on a <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H8071>garment<s%>; for whosoever <S%H6213>doeth<s%> these <S%H428>things<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

If a <S%H6833>bird<s%>'s <S%H7064>nest<s%> <S%H7122>chance<s%> to be <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, in any <S%H6086>tree<s%> or on the <S%H776>ground<s%>, with young <S%H667>ones<s%> or <S%H1000>eggs<s%>, and the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7257>sitting<s%> upon the <S%H667>young<s%>, or upon the <S%H1000>eggs<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H517>dam<s%> with the <S%H1121>young<s%>:

thou shalt <S%H7971>surely<s%> let the <S%H517>dam<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, but the <S%H1121>young<s%> thou mayest <S%H3947>take<s%> unto <S%H3190>thyself<s%>; that it may be well with <S%H748>thee<s%>, and that thou mayest prolong thy <S%H3117>days<s%>.

When thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4624>battlement<s%> for thy <S%H1406>roof<s%>, that thou <S%H7760>bring<s%> not <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, if any <S%H5307>man<s%> fall from <S%H5307>thence<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> with two kinds of <S%H2233>seed<s%>, lest the whole <S%H4395>fruit<s%> be <S%H6942>forfeited<s%>, the <S%H2233>seed<s%> which thou hast <S%H2232>sown<s%>, and the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H2790>plow<s%> with an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and an <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8162>mingled<s%> <S%H6785>stuff<s%>, wool and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H1434>fringes<s%> upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>borders<s%> of thy <S%H3682>vesture<s%>, wherewith thou coverest <S%H3680>thyself<s%>.
If any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H8130>her<s%>, and hate her,

and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> to her <S%H3318>charge<s%>, and bring up an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> upon <S%H559>her<s%>, and say, I <S%H3947>took<s%> this <S%H802>woman<s%>, and when I <S%H7126>came<s%> nigh to <S%H4672>her<s%>, I found not in her the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%>;

then shall the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>, and her <S%H517>mother<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the tokens of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1331>virginity<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>;

and the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto this <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>, and he hateth <S%H8130>her<s%>;

and <S%H7760><s%>, lo, he hath laid <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> to her <S%H559>charge<s%>, saying, I <S%H4672>found<s%> not in thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%> the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%>; and yet these are the tokens of my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1331>virginity<s%>. And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H8071>garment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> and chastise <S%H3256>him<s%>;

and they shall <S%H6064>fine<s%> him a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>, because he hath brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> upon a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and she shall be his <S%H802>wife<s%>; he <S%H3201>may<s%> not put her <S%H7971>away<s%> all his <S%H3117>days<s%>.
But if this <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H571>true<s%>, that the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%> were not <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>;

then they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> her to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%>, because she hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>: so shalt thou <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>thee<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7901>lying<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1166>married<s%> to a <S%H1167>husband<s%>, then they shall both of <S%H8147>them<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and the <S%H802>woman<s%>: so shalt thou put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

If there be a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H781>betrothed<s%> unto a <S%H376>husband<s%>, and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> her in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and lie with <S%H7901>her<s%>;

then ye shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H8147>both<s%> out unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%>, and ye shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%>; the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>, <S%H834>because<s%> she <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H5892>not<s%>, being in the city; and the <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H834>because<s%> he hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: so thou shalt put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>thee<s%>.

But if the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is <S%H781>betrothed<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>force<s%> <S%H7901>her<s%>, and lie with <S%H376>her<s%>; then the man only that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H4191>die<s%>:

but unto the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%>; there is in the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death<s%>: for as when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>riseth<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and <S%H7523>slayeth<s%> <S%H1697>him<s%>, even so is this matter;
for he <S%H4672>found<s%> her in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, the <S%H781>betrothed<s%> <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%>, and there was none to save <S%H3467>her<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H5291>damsel<s%> that is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, that is not <S%H781>betrothed<s%>, and lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H7901>her<s%>, and lie with <S%H4672>her<s%>, and they be found;

then the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and she shall be his <S%H802>wife<s%>, because he hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> <S%H3201>her<s%>; he may not put her <S%H7971>away<s%> all his <S%H3117>days<s%>.
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, and shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3671>skirt<s%>.
